messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM SUE EDWARDS
messages.content: Dear Resident, Like most people in Gordon, I feel let down by many of our elected politicians. MPs making huge expenses claims. Aberdeen City Council still in a financial mess. Aberdeenshire Council still undecided as to whether to force residents from their homes so Donald Trump can build an even larger golf course. But it doesn't have to be this way. And you can help make a difference – by voting for the Scottish Green Party. If you agree with our stance, please give me your support in the election tomorrow.

issues.governance: Aberdeen City Council still in a financial mess. Aberdeenshire Council still undecided as to whether to force residents from their homes so Donald Trump can build an even larger golf course.

housing.content: Aberdeenshire Council still undecided as to whether to force residents from their homes so Donald Trump can build an even larger golf course.
